source_note: Baseline from Mississippi DEQ Solid Waste Program and municipal guidance; local rules may vary.

organics.guidance: Composting allowed and encouraged; no statewide mandate.
organics.bin: Yard waste/organics cart or drop-off if available.

paper_cardboard.guidance: Recycle clean paper and cardboard; flatten boxes.

glass_containers.guidance: Glass accepted in limited programs; bottles/jars only.
glass_containers.notes: Many areas do not collect glass curbside.

metal_containers.guidance: Aluminum and steel cans, empty and rinsed.
metal_containers.notes: No scrap metal or pressurized cans.

plastics.notes: No film, bags, or foam curbside.

household_batteries.guidance: Recycle rechargeables/lead-acid at HHW or retailers.

e_waste.guidance: Use local e-waste events or certified recyclers.

bulky_items.guidance: Arrange special pickup or haul to landfill/transfer station.
provenance: Local solid waste departments in MS
